name: Final Match
description: Final Match is a simple card game, easy to learn, challenging and fast matches.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium D Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
